item.title: On Digital Gardens
item.description: What is a Digital Garden? In short, a digital garden (or personal wiki or hypertext farm or what-have-you) is a way of displaying your thinking.

item.title: Perfect First Drafts
item.description: “Every first draft is perfect, because all a first draft has to do is exist.” —Jane Smiley https://joelhooks.

item.title: Read It Now or Read It Never
item.description: Basically, get rid of your inboxes for links and stuff—you’re not going to really use them. When you come across something, you should either read it now or never read it.
